question: Are all team members competent, certified and authorized to do the job?
Are all team members medically fit to do the job they are assigned to?
Is a competent supervisor available on site?
Is any high-risk activity performed by a minimum of two personnel, with at least one trained on emergency procedures?
Are all tools and equipment inspected before use?
Is all equipment certified and within its inspection date?
Are defective tools and equipment tagged and removed from service?
Is personal protective equipment (PPE) available and in good condition?
Are emergency exits and escape routes clearly marked and accessible?
Is the work area free from slip, trip, and fall hazards?
Are hazardous materials properly labeled and stored?
Is adequate lighting provided in all work areas?
